item.title: Enhancements for protecting hosted SQL servers across clouds and hybrid environments
item.description: Introduction We are releasing an architecture upgrade for the Defender for SQL Servers on Machines plan. This upgrade is designed to simplify the onboarding experience and improve protection coverage. In this blog post, we will discuss details about the architecture upgrade and the key steps customers using the Defender for SQL Servers on Machine plan should take to adopt an optimal protection strategy following this update.
